title.rendered: SKEEPERS: Create Value by and for Your Customers!

content.rendered:
SKEEPERS is the European leader in customer engagement. We help brands generate incremental business by creating value by and for the customer.

SKEEPERS offers a wide range of levers on a single platform, such as customer reviews, video UGC, influencer marketing to increase brand visibility and conversion, customer feedback for continuous improvement of the customer experience, a predictive CDP to personalize brand/consumer interactions, etc.

The SKEEPERS group was born almost two years ago from the merger of several French start-ups. Today, the Group has nearly 450 employees, with offices all over France: Marseille, Paris, Lille, Nantes, Rennes and Toulouse. 

SKEEPERS is also present internationally, with offices in the United States, Brazil, Spain, Italy and Germany. 

SKEEPERS solutions are built around three main pillars:

  • Engage: engage your customers by generating and sharing consumer content.
  • Improve: track the continuous improvement of the customer experience through monitoring.
  • Activate: activate individualized marketing triggers to personalize your services and campaigns

The SKEEPERS group aims to meet the needs of a hyper-fragmented market, looking for a consolidated offer, with a range of complementary solutions to manage the customer experience cycle, from discovery to the purchase journey to re-engagement. 

These solutions are designed to work across the board and are available on a single platform. They enable you to act at each step of the customer journey to: 

  • Drive your customer experience
  • Manage your e-reputation
  • Engage your customer community
  • Adapt your product catalog
  • Improve your web performance
  • Become a customer-centric company

To find out more:

Read about each of our solutions in more detail:

  • CX Management
  • Ratings and Reviews 
  • User Generated Videos
  • Influencer Marketing
  • Predictive Marketing Activation

Check out our client case studies, with practical accounts of how our solutions have been implemented and a proven ROI:

  • Case studies

Are you interested in discussing our different solutions and finding out how they can help you create value by and for your customers? Contact your Customer Success Manager or your dedicated contact!
